body_html:
So in my case, the environment variable still works, as long as it is set *before* importing tensorflow for the first time. If I set it after importing TF, it doesn't have any effect. Do you observe the same behaviour?

body:
So in my case, the environment variable still works, as long as it is set
*before* importing tensorflow for the first time. If I set it after
importing TF, it doesn't have any effect. Do you observe the same behaviour?

>
